abstract.title: Introduction
abstract.para: Using the &cockpit; Overview part, you can change your host name or change the system date or time zone.

section.title: Changing the sever host name
section.para: To change the host name, proceed as follows:

step.para: In the Configuration part, click edit.

listitem.para: Pretty host name - a user-defined free-form host name
Real host name - is a name how the device is called in the network.

section.title: Changing the system time or time zone
section.para: To change the system time or time zone, proceed as follows:

procedure.title: Changing system time or time zone

step.para: click on the System time value
In the pop-up window you can change the following:

itemizedlist.listitem: Time zone - the default value was set during the installation or is UTC in the raw images.

listitem.para: Set time - by default NTP is used for time synchronisation. You can set the time manually or if you defined alternative NTP servers, you can use those NTP servers for time synchronization.
